entry.summary: RT Orlundo Hubbard | orlundo.eth So I just signed my offer letter for a software engineer role at @WurstaCo 🤫 I’ll be working in the Web3 department. 3 years ago, I was homeless, living out of my car - now my dreams are coming true right before my eyes, so surreal 😭. God is so good man! All glory goes to Him!
